snippet: The State Supreme Court was asked to block an investigation into whether the governor’s allies violated the law in fighting a recall bid.
abstract: Wisconsin Supreme Court orders end to investigation into whether Gov Scott Walker's recall campaign in 2012 illegally coordinated with conservative groups.

byline.contributor: Mitch Smith contributed reporting from Chicago, and Patrick Healy from Amherst, N.H.

lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court was asked to block an investigation into whether the governor’s allies violated the law in fighting a recall bid.

headline.main: Scott Walker 2012 Campaign Inquiry Ended by Wisconsin Court
headline.print_headline: Court Blocks Investigation Into ’12 Race by Walker

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
